v\u1edbi vi\u1ec7c \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t v\u1edbi c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7 hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i&nbsp;<strong>Wolver Racing<\/strong>&nbsp;c&ograve;n gi&uacute;p gi\u1ea3m thi\u1ec3u ho&aacute;,..&nbsp;<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<strong>Wolver Racing<\/strong>&nbsp;c&oacute; \u0111\u1ed9 nh\u1edbt th\u1ea5p n&ecirc;n khi kh\u1edfi \u0111\u1ed9ng (l&uacute;c nhi\u1ec7t \u0111\u1ed9 c&ograve;n th\u1ea5p) d\u1ea7u nh\u1edbt s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u01a1m&nbsp;\u0111\u1ebfn m\u1ecdi chi ti\u1ebft c\u1ee7a&nbsp;\u0111\u1ed9ng c\u01a1 m\u1ed9t c&aacute;ch nhanh nh\u1ea5t, vi\u1ec7c n&agrave;y s\u1ebd tr\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp gi&uacute;p cho xe l\u01b0\u1edbt nhanh v&agrave;&nbsp;&ecirc;m &aacute;i h\u01a1n, h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng t\u1ea3n nhi\u1ec7t v&agrave; l&agrave;m m&aacute;t m&aacute;y hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3 h\u01a1n. Kh&ocirc;ng nh\u1eefng v\u1eady, \u1edf&nbsp;nhi\u1ec7t&nbsp;\u0111\u1ed9 cao khi&nbsp;\u0111\u1ed9ng c\u01a1 \u0111ang ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng,&nbsp;<strong>WOLVER RACING 4T&nbsp;<\/strong>v\u1eabn duy tr&igrave;&nbsp;\u1ed5n&nbsp;\u0111\u1ecbnh t&iacute;nh n\u0103ng b&ocirc;i tr\u01a1n gi&uacute;p xe v\u1eadn h&agrave;nh t\u1ed1t m&agrave; kh&ocirc;ng g&acirc;y ra c&aacute;c hi\u1ec7n t\u01b0\u1ee3ng kh&aacute;c.<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong>Th&ocirc;ng s\u1ed1 k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt Nh\u1edbt Wolver Racing 4T:<\/strong><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>- Nh\u1edbt t\u1ed5ng h\u1ee3p 100%<br \/>\r\n-&nbsp;API SL, JASO MA2<br \/>\r\n- \u0110\u1ed9 nh\u1edbt SAE 10W40<br \/>\r\n- Dung t&iacute;ch nh\u1edbt: 1L<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"Nh\u1edbt wolver racing synthetic 10w40 1l - c&ograve;n c&oacute; th\u1ec3 d&ugrave;ng t\u1ed1t cho t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 c&aacute;c lo\u1ea1i xe m&aacute;y c&oacute; b\u1ed9 ly h\u1ee3p kh&ocirc; v&agrave;&nbsp;\u01b0\u1edbt (xe s\u1ed1 v&agrave; xe tay ga).<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/shop2banh.vn\/wolver.html\">Nh\u1edbt Wolver<\/a>&nbsp;Racing<\/strong>&nbsp;\u0111&atilde; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c&aacute;c nh&agrave; s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t xe m&aacute;y tr&ecirc;n th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi ch\u1ee9ng nh\u1eadn v\u01b0\u1ee3t m\u1ee9c ti&ecirc;u chu\u1ea9n y&ecirc;u c\u1ea7u k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt \u0111\u1ec1 ra,&nbsp;\u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o&nbsp;\u0111\u1ed9 b&ocirc;i tr\u01a1n&nbsp;\u0111&aacute;ng tin c\u1eady ngay trong&nbsp;\u0111i\u1ec1u ki\u1ec7n l\u01b0u th&ocirc;ng ph\u1ee9c t\u1ea1p nh\u01b0 \u0111&ocirc; th\u1ecb, \u0111\u1ed3i d\u1ed1c, \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng kh&oacute; kh\u0103n \u1edf Vi\u1ec7t Nam hi\u1ec7n nay, \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o ng\u0103n ng\u1eeba \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c hi\u1ec7n t\u01b0\u1ee3ng tr\u01b0\u1ee3t ly h\u1ee3p \u1edf th\u1eddi \u0111i\u1ec3m kh\u1edfi&nbsp;\u0111\u1ed9ng xe v&agrave; khi sang s\u1ed1 (\u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi xe s\u1ed1 v&agrave; xe tay c&ocirc;n 4 th&igrave;), v\u1edbi vi\u1ec7c \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t v\u1edbi c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7 hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i&nbsp;<strong>Wolver Racing<\/strong>&nbsp;c&ograve;n gi&uacute;p gi\u1ea3m thi\u1ec3u m\u1ee9c ti&ecirc;u hao nhi&ecirc;n li\u1ec7u t\u1ed1i \u0111a.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\nXe m&aacute;y s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng nh\u1edbt&nbsp;<strong>Wolver Racing Synthetic 10W40&nbsp;<\/strong>c&ograve;n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u01a1 ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng tr\u01a1n tru v&agrave; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 \u1edf m\u1ee9c cao nh\u1ea5t nh\u1edd h\u1ec7&nbsp;ph\u1ee5 gia b\u1ed5 sung ti&ecirc;n ti\u1ebfn nh\u01b0 ph\u1ee5 gia&nbsp;ch\u1ed1ng m&agrave;i m&ograve;n, ch\u1ed1ng l&atilde;o ho&aacute;,&nbsp;\u1ed5n&nbsp;\u0111\u1ecbnh&nbsp;oxy ho&aacute;,..&nbsp;<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<strong>Wolver Racing<\/strong>&nbsp;c&oacute; \u0111\u1ed9 nh\u1edbt th\u1ea5p n&ecirc;n khi kh\u1edfi \u0111\u1ed9ng (l&uacute;c nhi\u1ec7t \u0111\u1ed9 c&ograve;n th\u1ea5p) d\u1ea7u nh\u1edbt s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u01a1m&nbsp;\u0111\u1ebfn m\u1ecdi chi ti\u1ebft c\u1ee7a&nbsp;\u0111\u1ed9ng c\u01a1 m\u1ed9t c&aacute;ch nhanh nh\u1ea5t, vi\u1ec7c n&agrave;y s\u1ebd tr\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp gi&uacute;p cho xe l\u01b0\u1edbt nhanh v&agrave;&nbsp;&ecirc;m &aacute;i h\u01a1n, h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng t\u1ea3n nhi\u1ec7t v&agrave; l&agrave;m m&aacute;t m&aacute;y hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3 h\u01a1n. Kh&ocirc;ng nh\u1eefng v\u1eady, \u1edf&nbsp;nhi\u1ec7t&nbsp;\u0111\u1ed9 cao khi&nbsp;\u0111\u1ed9ng c\u01a1 \u0111ang ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng,&nbsp;<strong>WOLVER RACING 4T&nbsp;<\/strong>v\u1eabn duy tr&igrave;&nbsp;\u1ed5n&nbsp;\u0111\u1ecbnh t&iacute;nh n\u0103ng b&ocirc;i tr\u01a1n gi&uacute;p xe v\u1eadn h&agrave;nh t\u1ed1t m&agrave; kh&ocirc;ng g&acirc;y ra c&aacute;c hi\u1ec7n t\u01b0\u1ee3ng kh&aacute;c.<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong>Th&ocirc;ng s\u1ed1 k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt Nh\u1edbt Wolver Racing 4T:<\/strong><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>- Nh\u1edbt t\u1ed5ng h\u1ee3p 100%<br
